mapper.select: SELECT rela.CHANNELID, channel.CHANNELNAME, channel.CHANNELIMG, rela.GROUPNAME, rela.WEIGHT, rela.COMPANYID, rela.ID, rela.GROUPID FROM hm_crm_shop_channel_group_rela rela LEFT JOIN hm_crm_channel channel ON channel.COMPANYID = rela.COMPANYID AND rela.CHANNELID = channel.ID WHERE rela.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND rela.SHOPID = #{shopId}
